headline: A Look At Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) Valuation After New Buyback Dividend And Earnings Momentum
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) is back in focus after announcing a new US$2b share buyback, a US$1.00 quarterly dividend, and setting expectations ahead of its upcoming fourth quarter earnings release. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean Cruises. The announcement has landed after a strong run in the share price, with a 1 day share price return of 6.28% and a 30 day share price return of 15.56% lifting Royal Caribbean Cruises to US$297.75. Against that backdrop, the 1 year total...

headline: WELCOME TO PARADISE: ROYAL CARIBBEAN'S ROYAL BEACH CLUB PARADISE ISLAND IS NOW OPEN
summary: Royal Caribbean's Royal Beach Club Paradise Island is officially open. The first-of-its-kind beach club destination welcomed its first vacationers Dec. 23, debuting an all-inclusive beach day that combines the vibrancy and beauty of The Bahamas with Royal Caribbean signature touches. The grand opening comes just a few days after the beach club's official ribbon cutting celebration, where Bahamian government officials, VIPs and community members joined Royal Caribbean executives to celebrate the

thumbnail.caption: The Floating Flamingo, the world’s largest swim-up bar, is where vacationers can keep the party vibes going all day long on Royal Caribbean’s Royal Beach Club Paradise Island. Fueled by DJ-spun beats and dancing, the swim-up bar located in Party Cove serves up tropical cocktails, a VIP section and more.
